name: Zoo Lines
description:
Zoo Lines - another version of the well-known Lines! Your aim is to clean the field from balls forming lines or some other figures and to open wonderful pictures of animals.

You will find here a number of interesting surprises and special additions:
- new design;
- beautiful pictures of animals instead of simple checked board;
- balls of different color and type (double-colored
balls; bombs; immovable balls; balls which you need to open twice and so on).

Your high score and current progress are saved after you exit the game, so next time you can start from the place where you stopped. In case of Internet connection your results are saved in the world statistics. No doubt, with Zoo Lines you will never get bored, as it's not so easy to open these pictures!
